body: This only really applies if the setting "Popup card image using mouse wheel..." is true in which case when the mouse cursor moves over a face down morph card
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Show morph card on mouse over.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 08, 2014 04:32:44_

This only really applies if the setting "Popup card image using mouse wheel..." is true in which case when the mouse cursor moves over a face down morph card

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=641_
